Html:
It's been almost 8 months after the last release! I know that some of the issues have been resolved and other great additions like submission and publishing automation are in place.

Just curious!

This project is definitily the best ASP.MVC school

It is really pity that Kazi, the father of this project, totally gave up on it

Moses, who was very active and the father of the EF part,  too has not been giving any sign of life here for a while

Kazi, Moses,

Please, we need you  back to this wonderful project

I think we should create a separate thread for this and hear the people voice.

Technical:
-------------
1. Upgrade to .NET 4.0.
2. Upgrade to MVC 2.0.
3. Move to EF 4.0 and drop the other Data Access (e.g. L2S, EF3.5). Though there might be breaking changes with the existing.
4. Rearchitect the Domain Model since we can utilize pure POCO in EF.

Features:
----------------
1. Automation with Live writer.
2. Story can be submitted without a link, I think Reddit has this feature.

Hi Kazi
nice to see you're still watching this project
One important feature I'll add to your list is Localization
